 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עוּשׁ‎</span>] **verb** si vera lectio, ==lend aid, come to help== (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> IV. ***aid, succour***; Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֿותֿ‎</span> noun ***help***, [[BDB#SabDenkm|SabDenkm]]<sup>91</sup>; Nabataean, Sinaitic <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עות‎</span> in proper name [[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>337</sup> [[BDB#Cook|Cook]]<sup>90</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Imperative*** masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עוּשׁוּ וָבֹאוּ‎</span> [[Joel.4.11|Joel 4:11]] but dubious; [[BDB#Gr|Gr]] [[BDB#Dr|Dr]], plausibly, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חוּשׁוּ‎</span>; [[BDB#Che|Che]]<sup>Expos., Nov. 1897,365</sup> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גְּשׁוּ‎</span> (√ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נגשׁ‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עוּרוּ‎</span> [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Now|Now]].
